title: ISS Study Week + Express Travel Signatures
description: December 9th - December 20th is ISS Study Week, featuring extended study hours in the International Community Center (ICC).

title: China in the Global Information Ecosystem
description: While digital communication technologies have revolutionized the way information can flow across borders and national boundaries.

title: Drop-In Virtual Support for Survivors
description: This is a space for UW-Madison student survivors to connect with peers and offer mutual support in a confidential and safe environment.

title: Applying to the School of Nursing Traditional Program for Fall 2025
description: This in-person information session is for students interested in applying to our Traditional BS in Nursing program for Fall 2025.

title: Let's Talk
description: Join us for no-cost, informal, consultations with Mental Health Provider, Annie Bruns. No topic is off-limits.

title: Biochemistry Colloquium - Julia Widom
description: Julia Widom is from the University of Oregon.

description: Whether you are starting a new business or looking to organize your current business’ finances.

description: Enjoy captivating and award-winning children's literature that celebrates the diversity of art, culture, and language across the African continent.

title: 2024 Cool Science Image Contest Exhibition
description: 2024 winning image entries showcase the research, innovation, scholarship, and curiosity of the UW–Madison community.

title: UW Russian Folk Orchestra Weekly Practice/Rehearsal
description: The University of Wisconsin Russian Folk Orchestra (RFO) in its 27th season has openings for musicians for the 2024-2025 school year.

title: All Recovery Meeting with Badger Recovery
description: Badger Recovery’s All Recovery meetings provide a space where individuals can openly discuss their recovery journeys from substance use.

title: Military-Connected Finals Study Day with Hot Chocolate
description: This will be the final Study Tuesday for the Fall semester and UVS wants to close out the semester with a hot chocolate bar.
